root.PROPERTY:order:name: Product name
root.pceReport:filter:invalid: Specify an order/product or a date and a line.
root.pceReport:column:pce:order:title: PCE number in the production order
root.pceReport:column:pce:shift:title: PCE number in the line order
root.pceReport:chart:title: Cycle time
root.groupsReport:filter:minQty: Minimum total quantity todo in a production order
root.groupsReport:filter:maxQty: Maximum total quantity todo in a production order
root.groupsReport:filter:minT:
n - cycle time greater than or equal to n
n% - cycle time greater than or equal to n percent of the SAP Takt Time
~n - absolute value of difference between SAP Takt Time and actual cycle time is greater than or equal to n
root.groupsReport:filter:maxT:
n - cycle time less than or equal to n
n% - cycle time less than or equal to n percent of the SAP Takt Time
~n - absolute value of difference between SAP Takt Time and actual cycle time is less than or equal to n
root.groupsReport:column:name: Product name
root.groupsReport:column:qtyMatched: Quantity done with the Cycle time filter
root.groupsReport:column:qtyDone: Quantity done without the Cycle time filter
root.groupsReport:column:qtyTodo: Total quantity todo in the production order
root.groupsReport:chart:title: Cycle time
